entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 a.m. CST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
